popup.message: Logic is the beginning of wisdom, not the end.

token_not_found.message: Token not found. Tap once and wait.

src_not_replaced.message: If Hamster Kombat shows qr-code and doesn't start in Web - press the button below

wrong_tab.message: Open telegram web-version tab and start Hamster Kombat

settings_useEnergyBoost_description.message: After each tap, looks for the presence of available energy boosts, uses them if available and tap again

settings_dailyCombo_description.message: Checks the availability of all combo cards, as well as the number of coins, if all conditions are met - buys cards and takes the reward

settings_reinvestPassiveIncome_descripti.message: Each cycle buys cards with the best ratio (income / price) for the amount of profit per hour

settings_tapPercent_description.message: Percentage of coins from the maximum amount of energy. (For example, if 2000 energy is available and the setting is set to 50%, the bot will farm 1000 coins). After a successful tap, the bot will go into standby mode until the energy is completely restored and a new cycle will begin.
settings_tapPercent_description.description: Choose % of coins per tap description

empty_logs.message: There are no logs at the moment
